Automatic Biography: Queasy Memoirs

Home | About |

Automatic Biography: Queasy Memoirs is a serialised reading of a novel by one, David Goodchild.

Also available on all major podcast platforms: Anchor | Apple | Google | Spotify | Breaker | Overcast | Pocket Casts | Radio Public | Stitcher

Episode 3 - Send Me A Fiver And I'll .../Globs Of Cellophane Haunt .../Poem Dictated By An Albino...

01 Feb 2019 - mike

Send Me A Fiver And I’ll Goose Your Granny/Globs Of Cellophane Haunt The Burger Van/Poem Dictated By An Albino With Bleeding Eyeballs Under Ultraviolet Light

Chapters four, five and six. We learn about spitting soggy paper, we meet Rachel (ahhhhh), real life Operation, Ralf the Vampire and some interesting methods of paying your electricity bill.
